## house_num別データ件数と期間
```{r}
o_house <- dbGetQuery(con,"
            select
            	distinct(A.house_num),
            	count(A.house_num),
              min(B.br_start_datetime),
              max(B.br_end_datetime)
            from
            	processed.tv_orgn_p_cv as B
            right join
            	(select
            		house_num
            	 from
            		add_data.target) as A
            on
            	A.house_num = B.house_num
            group by
            	A.house_num;
           ")
o_house %>% kable()
o_house %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=house_num, y=count))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  theme_bw()

# ログTOP10
o_house %>% 
  filter(count>4500)
```

## 局
```{r}
o_sta <- dbGetQuery(con,"
           select
            	distinct(B.station_code),
            	count(B.station_code)
            from
            	processed.tv_orgn_p_cv as B
            right join
            	(select
            		house_num
            	 from
            		add_data.target) as A
            on
            	A.house_num = B.house_num
            group by
            	B.station_code
            order by 
            	B.station_code;
           ")
o_sta %>% kable()

station_name <- c("日本テレビ", "ＴＢＳ" , "フジテレビ", "テレビ朝日" , "テレビ東京", "ＮＨＫ総合" , "ＮＨＫＥテレ")

o_sta %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=station_code, y=count))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  labs(title = "局別視聴番組数")+
  xlim(station_name)+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust=1))
```

## 曜日
```{r}
o_week <- dbGetQuery(con,"
                       select
                      	distinct(B.br_day_week),
                      	count(B.br_day_week)
                      from
                      	processed.tv_orgn_p_cv as B
                      right join
                      	(select
                      		house_num
                      	 from
                      		add_data.target) as A
                      on
                      	A.house_num = B.house_num
                      group by
                      	B.br_day_week
                      order by 
                      	B.br_day_week;
           ")

o_week %>% kable()

week <- c("月","火","水","木","金","土","日")
o_week %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=br_day_week, y=count))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  labs(title = "曜日別視聴番組数")+
  xlim(week)+
  theme_bw()
```

# 時間帯別
```{r}
o_hourly <- dbGetQuery(con,"
                      SELECT
                            A.house_num,
                            EXTRACT(HOUR FROM B.br_start_datetime),
                            COUNT(*)
                      FROM 
                            processed.tv_orgn_p_cv as B
                      right join
                      	(select
                      		house_num
                      	from
                      		add_data.target) as A
                      	on
                      		A.house_num = B.house_num
                      	group by
                      		EXTRACT(HOUR FROM B.br_start_datetime),
                      		A.house_num
                      	ORDER BY
                      		house_num,
                      		EXTRACT(HOUR FROM B.br_start_datetime);
                      ")
o_hourly %>% 
#  as_tibble() %>% 
  rename(hour = date_part) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = hour, y = count, fill = factor(house_num)))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  labs(title = "視聴時間帯分布")+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())


```
